channel.title: non-PVP area's/safe pvp areas
channel.description: mk, so my home is going to be clan wars and i want it to be a safe zone no PvP at all in clan wars (the old clan wars where all the portals are) and when you walk out of that building i want it to be safe PvP zone how do i do that? thanks.
